definition: phagocyte (cell that ingests and destroys foreign matter)
microphage (a type of white blood cell)

sentences.chinese: 恩佐斯将吞噬你们所有人。

sentences.english: Vacuoles in animal cells carry out phagocytosis (the intake of particulate matter) and pinocytosis (vacuolar drinking).
sentences.chinese: 动物中的液泡起吞噬和胞饮作用。

sentences.english: When the amoebas find a pathogen, they devour it.
sentences.chinese: 一旦发现病原体，就会把它吞噬掉。

sentences.english: Photography, of course, was eaten by software long ago.
sentences.chinese: 摄影，更无须说，很久以前就已被软件所吞噬。
没有轻触，只有捕捉和吞噬。

sentences.english: When we get an infection, white blood cells called phagocytes leap into action.
sentences.chinese: 人感染时，机体的白细球吞噬细胞行动起来消除感染。

sentences.english: The fire builds, devouring everything in its path.
sentences.chinese: 凶猛的大火将沿途上的一切都吞噬。

sentences.english: Honeysuckle can accelerate lymphocyte transformation and strengthen phagocytic function of white blood cell.
sentences.chinese: 金银花能促进淋巴细胞转化，增强白细胞的吞噬功能。

sentences.english: The production and deployment of phagocytes are central functions of the hematopoietic system.
sentences.chinese: 吞噬细胞产物和铺开是造血系统的中央职能。

sentences.english: It wasn't near as bad as, say, being eaten alive by wolves.
sentences.chinese: 说起来，它也还并没有糟糕到被群狼活活吞噬的地步。

sentences.english: And as each invention arrives, it eats further into our time.
sentences.chinese: 而每一项新发明问世，就进一步吞噬我们的光阴。

sentences.english: Of bug of a legendary venomous insect gobble up below, the veil of nitty-gritty is dripping blood.
sentences.chinese: 蛊虫的吞噬下，事实真相的面纱滴着鲜血。

sentences.english: In the far future, our life-giving sun will engulf (swallow) us all.
sentences.chinese: 在很久的将来，给予我们生命的太阳将会把我们吞噬。

sentences.english: In addition, many phagocytes have other specialized functions.
sentences.chinese: 此外，许多吞噬细胞还有其他专门的功能。

sentences.english: Use the Giemsa staining method to detect the mouses peritoneal macrophages phagocytosis function.
sentences.chinese: 采用姬姆萨染色法检测小鼠腹腔巨噬细胞的吞噬功能。

sentences.english: Animal viruses generally are phagocytosed and gain entry to host cells from vacuoles .
sentences.chinese: 动物病毒则一般是吞噬后从空泡进入宿主细胞内。
